mapper.select: SELECT * FROM moment_comment WHERE moment_id = #{momentId} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY create_time ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO moment_comment (id, post_id, user_id, content, reply_to_comment_id, create_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{postId}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{replyToCommentId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.post_id, c.user_id, p.display_name as username, p.avatar, c.content, c.reply_to_comment_id, c.create_time, r_p.user_id as replyToUserId, r_p.display_name as replyToUsername FROM moment_comment c LEFT JOIN user_profile p ON c.user_id = p.user_id LEFT JOIN moment_comment r ON c.reply_to_comment_id = r.id LEFT JOIN user_profile r_p ON r.user_id = r_p.user_id WHERE c.post_id = #{postId} AND c.deleted = 0 ORDER BY c.create_time ASC
